entities

Class PastCreature

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.Entity
      • entities.Creature
        • entities.RecordableCreature
          • entities.PastCreature

  • public class PastCreature
extends RecordableCreature
    Class that tracks states of all past selves in the single-player co-op game Works for both zombies and player creatures

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PastCreature(java.util.List<java.lang.Double> walkBehaviorsX, java.util.List<java.lang.Double> walkBehaviorsZ, java.util.List<java.lang.Double> xPositions, java.util.List<java.lang.Double> zPositions, java.util.List<java.lang.Double> actionBehaviors, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> attackBehaviors, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> pushBehaviors, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> pushedBehaviors, int tickThatCreatureDies, EntityManager entityManager)
      Constructor takes three Lists, the first of X-axis walking behaviors, the second of Z-axis walkingdw behaviors, and the final of action behaviors so that these actions can be "replayed" where each index is the equivalent turn counter in the game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PastCreature

        public PastCreature(java.util.List<java.lang.Double> walkBehaviorsX,
                    java.util.List<java.lang.Double> walkBehaviorsZ,
                    java.util.List<java.lang.Double> xPositions,
                    java.util.List<java.lang.Double> zPositions,
                    java.util.List<java.lang.Double> actionBehaviors,
                    java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> attackBehaviors,
                    java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> pushBehaviors,
                    java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> pushedBehaviors,
                    int tickThatCreatureDies,
                    EntityManager entityManager)
        Constructor takes three Lists, the first of X-axis walking behaviors, the second of Z-axis walkingdw behaviors, and the final of action behaviors so that these actions can be "replayed" where each index is the equivalent turn counter in the game. It also takes a boolean value that is true if the new PastCreature is a Zombie, and false if it is a Player
        Parameters:
        walkBehaviorsX - x-axis
        walkBehaviorsZ - z-axis
        actionBehaviors - behavior of current creature
